attributes.additional_details: Since God made HImself known to the world His Holy Majesty has commanded we obey HIs laws and precepts so we become as one nation one people.           St Bede the venerable realised this commitment thus England came into being.  One such law involved the sacred rite of Holy Matrimony between man and woman to perpetuate the Human race. So I humbly request to Not Pass  a law to allow same sex marriage to become legal so the ceremonies are forced into the realm of the sacred
